title: firefox is stalling on ubuntu 24
content: firefox stalls on ubuntu and the OS says it is running but I cannot or don't know how to restart/reset it from the terminal. A reboot of the computer solves the issue but I have to re enter the bios password etc. Is there a simple solution?

title: main password denied
content:
(English follows) Veuillez saisir votre mot de passe principal." : cette fenêtre apparaît à tout bout de champ. Réinitialiser ? La clé de sécurité est refusée... Et je suis incapable de fermer mon compte... C'est un cul-de-sac. À l'aide SVP ! Merci

Hello all "Please enter your master password." This window appears at every turn. Reset? The security key is denied... And I am unable to close the account... It's a dead end for me. Help please ! Eloa

title: Firefox on  Steam Deck Login Problem
content: I installed Firefox on a new steam deck. The device comes with an icon to download and install the browser. steam''' I get a 500 error when I try to log in. The login page never appears.
creator: pianoforty

title: Browser keeps creating "Downloads" folder with custom one being set
content: Even though the custom folder for "downloads" has been set firefox keeps creating new one in the home folder. Nothing I've tried to do helped. From the bug reports I see this problem exists in the firefox at least for 15 years! I can't believe it is still not fixed. That's kind of behavior minor enough for the developers to take care of and major enough for the users to give up and switch browsers if it is not fixed. Crazy.
creator: ilia20018

title: Out of all the websites IsraLove.org  website fails to connect in Firefox... Is Firefox antisemitic???
